maze.logic

Class GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.GameConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that contains all the information related to the configuration of the game maze and game keys.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameConfig

        public GameConfig()
        Default Constructor.

      • GameConfig

        public GameConfig(int mode)
        Constructor for a game configuration. Reads the difficulty, dragon percentage and the maze size from the user. Sets the game to graphical or NON-graphical mode according to the parameter [mode].
        Parameters:
        mode - : value of the mode

      • GameConfig

        public GameConfig(int mode,
          double dragonPerc)
        Constructor for a game configuration. Sets the dragon number percentage. Reads the difficulty and the maze size from the user. Sets the game to graphical or NON-graphical mode according to the parameter [mode].
        Parameters:
        mode - : value of the mode
        dragonPerc - : percentage of dragons in the maze

      • GameConfig

        public GameConfig(int mazeSize,
          int difficulty,
          double dragonPerc)
        Constructor for a game configuration. Sets the dragon number percentage. Sets the maze size and difficulty.
        Parameters:
        mazeSize - : the size of the maze
        difficulty - : the difficulty of the game [3 available]
        dragonPerc - : percentage of dragons in the maze
